articles.title: Morgan Wallen postpones six weeks of tour after injury: 'Bad news' - USA TODAY
articles.description: Morgan Wallen's voice woes continue. The country star has postponed his upcoming tour dates after being placed on vocal rest for six weeks.
articles.content:
Morgan Wallen is still dealing with One Thing At a Time.
